# OBJECT::CREATE_PORTABLE_PICKUP

## Parameters
* **PICKUP_TYPE** type
* **FLOAT** newCoorsX
* **FLOAT** newCoorsY
* **FLOAT** newCoorsZ
* **BOOL** snapToGround = true: When created the pickup will be placed on the ground correctly
* **MODEL_NAMES** customModel = 0:
If set this model will be used for the pickup instead of the default one bNetwork				If true, the pickup will be synced across the network.
If false, it won't appear on other machines

## Returns
* **OBJECT_INDEX**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
This creates a pickup object that persists and is carried when collected and can be attached to peds, etc. You can only call this for pickups that
are set up to be portable in the pickups.meta data file. The OBJECT_INDEX that is returned can be used like any other object.

Full list of pickup types by DurtyFree: https://github.com/DurtyFree/gta-v-data-dumps/blob/master/pickupTypes.json
